plot: The evil King Dedede has stolen all the food from the peaceful Dreamland inhabitants. Kirby must find his way to Castle Dedede and defeat him to save his people.
title: Hoshi no Kâbî
plot_es: The evil King Dedede has stolen all the food from the peaceful Dreamland inhabitants. Kirby must find his way to Castle Dedede and defeat him to save his people.
plot_en: The evil King Dedede has stolen all the food from the peaceful Dreamland inhabitants. Kirby must find his way to Castle Dedede and defeat him to save his people.
